title: Golden era of music ended: Bollywood pays tribute to Lata Mangeshkar
description: From Anil Kapoor to Akshay Kumar, several members from the film industry paid tribute to legendary singer Lata Mangeshkar, who passed away on Sunday morning at the age of 92

title: Messi, Mbappe on target as PSG thrash sorry Lille
description: Lionel Messi and Kylian Mbappe both scored as Paris Saint-Germain stretched their mammoth lead at the top of Ligue 1 to 13 points with a 5-1 thrashing of defending champions Lille on Sunday

title: Construction companies, raw material producers to meet every three months
description: In this context, Bangladesh Steel Manufacturers Association (BSMA) and Bangladesh Association of Construction Industry (BACI) held a meeting at the FBCCI office recently, said a press release on Saturday
